ms.translation[1].definitions[0].definit: used before a woman’s family name when she does not want to be called ‘Mrs’ or ‘Miss’, or when you do not know whether she is married or not
ms.translation[2].definitions[0].definit: a US magazine for women, started by the feminist writer Gloria Steinem
ms.translation[3].definitions[0].definit: a serious illness that gradually destroys the nerves, causing weakness and inability to move
ms.translation[4].definitions[0].definit: a university degree in a science subject that you can get after your first degree
ms.translation[5].definitions[0].definit: a title used before a married or an unmarried woman’s family name when being polite
ms.translation[5].definitions[0].example: Is that Mrs or Ms?  (=used when asking how someone likes to be addressed)
